allorsUnifiedGood.name: HYDRO TOWUNIV-2
allorsUnifiedGood.description:
Customers worldwide trust in the outstanding quality of the Hydro aircraft towing and pushback equipment. Hydro tow-bars perfectly fit the requirements from aircraft manufacturers. They will convince you with user-friendliness and short lead times, and are designed according to the applicable norms and standards.
The portfolio covers your whole aircraft fleet whether you have narrow-body, wide-body, business jets, regional jet aircraft or helicopters.

**Your benefits?**

- Safety, quality and durability “Made in Germany”,
- Designed to standards,
- Long service life,
- Ergonomic design,
- Wide range of options to satisfy your needs,
- Easy maneuvering due to an optimized undercarriage with integrated floating axle system,
- Tow-head design with integrated shear pins and retaining pin,
- At least 10 years of spare parts availability.
